content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE clm.Claim
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'trg@e2nprdadls01.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    DATA_SOURCE = transdatapool,  
    FILE_FORMAT = transdatapoolFormat
)  
AS
SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://e2nprdadls01.dfs.core.windows.net/trg/synapse/cc_TransParq/parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS [result]
GO
-- you can query the newly created external table
SELECT * FROM clm.Claim
